creator: cppaul@ameritech.net
text:
When I try to run ant, I receive the following error message:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
org/apache/tools/ant/Main

I have gone thru the installation manual on this site, and have followed the 
instructions. I have set ant_home to point to where ant is installed, and have 
moved the xercesImpl.jar and xmlParserAPIs.jar into the Ant lib directory.

Any help would be appreciated. Thank you!!!!!

creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
Have you posted this problem on the ant-user mailing list? That is probably a
better forum for such questions about old versions. 1.4.1 has been used by
thousands of people (hundreds of whom read ant-user). The chance that it is
completely broken and doesn't run at all is next to none. I don't think this
qualifies as a bug, but I will let a committer decide to mark it invalid :).

I'm replying so that you don't have to wait for them to get around to it.

creator: cppaul@ameritech.net
text:
Thank you...I realized that I should not have posted my problem here and this 
is a site for reported bugs only. Sorry for any inconvenience.
